text: Timothy L. "Tim" McInnerny ( ; born 18 September 1956) is an English actor. He is known for his many roles on television and stage. Early in his career, he featured as Lord Percy Percy and Captain Darling in the Blackadder series. He is best known for his role as Robett Glover in the HBO series Game of Thrones. ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English radio actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Gloucestershire
title: Tim McInnerny
